pullrequest.title: Scene3d plugin: Subscribe to pose topic

content.raw:
I was looking at gazebo when implementing this and noticed that we have [this comment](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/f4e51e8f64001beda70615ab8982a7d5a4e65b18/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc#lines-2080) about pose msgs arriving before visual msgs.

I think it’s fine for now as we don’t receive any msgs / events when new objects are added / removed so the problem shouldn’t occur. 

I cleared the pose msgs and added a comment as a reminder that this may be necessary in the future.  [e72b55d](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/e72b55d97ecfcf878fc1c95bcf6fa2c1127ebffa).
content.html:
I was looking at gazebo when implementing this and noticed that we have this comment about pose msgs arriving before visual msgs.

I think it’s fine for now as we don’t receive any msgs / events when new objects are added / removed so the problem shouldn’t occur.

I cleared the pose msgs and added a comment as a reminder that this may be necessary in the future. e72b55d.
